com.chap.links.client
Class DataTable

java.lang.Object
  com.chap.links.client.DataConnector
      com.chap.links.client.DataTable

public class DataTable
extends DataConnector

The DataTable is a DataConnector which can store a table in native Javascript, containing native JavaScriptObjects

Author:
jos
